scripts.test: rm -rf ./coverage && npm run jscs && npm run eslint && npm run mocha
scripts.coveralls: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report html --report lcovonly -- --require babel-core/register  tests/*_spec.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.mocha: node_modules/.bin/istanbul test node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report html -- --require babel-core/register tests/*_spec.js --reporter spec
